text: Global technology and innovation company @IBM has reissued a report into Loneliness and Isolation, authored by our very own Professor @nipalm, Director of @InnovAgeUK 👏 Read the report here 👉https://t.co/NYX77ICMqS #COVID19 #WeAreNCL #unisupport #WeAreTogether https://t.co/ipJptnlnYu
